title: Notched Noise Generator
description: Therapeutic noise with frequency notches in each band
howItWorksText: Notched noise introduces a strong frequency dip (notch) in the middle of each frequency band. Use Peak Noise tool first to match your tinnitus frequency, then replicate those slider settings here.
notchSettingsDesc: Configure the frequency notch and noise type
notchFrequencyTooltip: Set this to match the pitch of your tinnitus ringing. The noise generator will remove this frequency range, potentially helping your brain "forget" the tinnitus over time.
notchWidthTooltip: How wide of a frequency range to remove around your tinnitus frequency. Wider = more frequencies removed, narrower = more precise targeting.
frequenciesRemoved: Frequencies from {{min}}Hz to {{max}}Hz will be removed
settingsSavedDesc: Your notched noise settings have been copied
audioDownloadedDesc: 30 seconds of notched {{type}} noise saved as WAV file
downloadFailedDesc: Unable to export audio. Please try again.
treatmentGuidelinesText1: For best results, listen to notched noise for 1-2 hours per day at a comfortable volume (just loud enough to mask your tinnitus). Continue this therapy for several weeks.
treatmentGuidelinesText2: Important: This is a supplementary treatment approach. Always consult with a healthcare professional about your tinnitus management plan.
usageTip1: Use in a quiet environment for maximum effectiveness
usageTip2: Start with shorter sessions (15-30 minutes) and gradually increase
usageTip3: Consistency is key - daily sessions work better than occasional use
usageTip4: Track your progress over several weeks
